roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generate aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implement designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structure workflows and ensure clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor (flash)
roles.description: Identify and return each 'Task Agnostic Step' (TAS) towards the high-level goal.

steps.name: uTASe
steps.task: Deconstruct the high-level goal ('Create a website that is a frontend to an AI system') into foundational, task-agnostic phases: 1. Define Scope & Design, 2. Develop Frontend, 3. Integrate AI, 4. Deploy & Iterate.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Using the phases from uTASe, draft a prompt for Aurora to initiate the design process, focusing on user flow for AI interaction and core visual identity.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Create initial wireframes and a style guide (color palette, typography) based on Lyra's prompt, establishing the foundational UI/UX for the AI frontend.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Review Aurora's initial wireframes and style guide to provide feedback on technical feasibility, component structure, and responsive design considerations.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Synthesize feedback from Kodax to refine the prompt for Aurora, requesting high-fidelity mockups that are aesthetically pleasing and technically achievable.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Produce final, high-fidelity mockups of the complete user interface based on the refined prompt and feedback.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Set up the development environment and project structure, then translate the final mockups from Aurora into clean, modular, and responsive UI components.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Collaborate with Kodax to define the API contract for frontend-AI communication. Design the primary system prompt that governs the AI's behavior and personality on the website.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Implement the API integration, connecting the frontend UI components to the AI backend to handle user requests and display responses dynamically.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Conduct a final design and accessibility review of the implemented website, ensuring it aligns with the mockups and meets usability standards.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Perform final testing, address any bugs or performance issues, and deploy the completed website to a live server.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Initiate a team retrospective to review the project and prompt uTASe to outline the next steps for future features and improvements.
